Toya StoryToya工作室的故事How an Israeli studiomakes Minecraft magic to inspire women
一个位于以色列的游戏工作室是怎样通过 Minecraft 的独特之处来激励女性的

Minecraft is a game for everyone! 
Minecraft理应是适合所有人的游戏！

That’s not just some fluffy ideal we have - it’sstatistically true. Young and old, people of every nation and gender, they allfind something to love about Minecraft. But not everything in this big wideworld is quite as equal. Gaming, and technology in general, has for many yearsbeen thought of as a boys’ club. And that’s a shame. 
这不并不是一个毫无依据的说法，它符合统计学规律！ Minecraft 的玩家，尽管国籍、年龄或性别不同，但他们都能在 Minecraft 中找到一些自己的乐趣。可遗憾的是，世界很大，并不是所有事情都是绝对公平的。就像一直以来，游戏与科技似乎都是男孩子的专利。


Toya think so too - which is whythey create games (and Marketplace content) which celebrate amazing woman andtry to help girls realise their true talents and strengths. It’s a pretty coolidea, if you ask us - and the results are fun to play regardless of your gender!
Toya工作室也这样认为，他们为了纪念那些杰出的女性，创造出了这些游戏（还有那些商店中的内容），他们希望这样能帮助那些女孩子发现自身的强大之处。很棒的想法！ 如果你问我对此的看法是什么，回答是  ——  我希望在游戏的世界中 ，可以不分性别！ 
Their first contribution to Minecraft Marketplace was“My Gorilla Adventure”, a piece that highlighted the life of conservationist DianFossey - a controversial but incredibly brave women who dedicated much of herlife to the study of gorillas, and battled poachers in the mountain forests ofRwanda. 

为了纪念动物学家DianFossey，所以他们在Minecraft市场发表的第一款内容是“My Gorilla Adventure”，DianFossey是一位饱受争议的女性，可她却拥有令人难以置信的勇气，她把生命中的大半时间都奉献给大猩猩的研究事业，曾经为了保护大猩猩，她甚至在Rwanda的森林中与偷猎者作战。





[The film] Gorillas in the Mist had a huge impact on me as a young woman,” says AnatShperling, who co-founded Toya with Yifat Anzelevich. “I remember feelingshocked and amazed to see a woman, an ape researcher, fighting for the rightsof these amazing creatures and protecting them. She made me believe I couldbecome an ape researcher if I wanted to. This is how I want girls to experienceToya's games. Walking into a wild adventure, becoming someone else, somewhereelse, while seeing a super cool and achievable ambition.”
AnatShperling，与Yifat Anzelevich一起建立了Toya工作室，她说道：“当我年轻的时候，[电影] Gorillas in the Mist 对我产生了巨大的影响。我记得，当我看到一个女性猿类研究者，为了守护这些独特生物的权利而战，而且一直保护着它们，我感到多么震惊与惊讶。她让我认为，如果我愿意，我也能成为一名猿类研究者。这就是我想让女孩们体验Toya的游戏的原因。让她们尝试一个野外探险的游戏，试着变成另一个人，来到一些未曾到达地方，看一些超级酷的东西，让她们知道她们的野心是可以实现的。”
Anat’s own early ambitions wereto become either a vet or a filmmaker, or possibly both, but eventually shemade her way into television as a journalist in Tel Aviv. But as she moved intomore senior positions she began to be aware of the ‘glass ceiling’ - the limitto the opportunities available to her as a woman.

Anat早期的梦想是能当一个兽医或者电影制片人，如果可以的话，她想兼职这两份职业，但是最终她却以Tel Aviv（特拉维夫）记者的身份进入了电视广播业。当她升到更高级的职位的时候，开始注意到了“无形顶障” —— 限制女性在职务上升的机会。
“This is how the International Women's Film Festivalbegan,” she says. “I felt we had to rock the ship or nothing would change. AndI can say we made a huge difference after a decade of hard work, and awonderful festival, showcasing films made by and about women and girls from allover the world.”

“这便是国际妇女电影节开始的原因，”她说。“我觉得我们必须做点什么，不然一切都不会被改变。我可以说，我们通过数十年的努力，举办了一次了不起的的电影节，展示了来自全世界各地女性制作的电影，我们取得了巨大的成就。”
As successful as the International Women’s FilmFestival has been, Anat felt there was more she and her long-time film-festivalcollaborator Yifat could do to promote equality. “I called [Yifat] one day,saying we had to go back to childhood and deal with changing social patternsfrom an early stage if we wanted our daughters and sons to know they couldpursue the same opportunities.”
尽管国际电影妇女电影节取得了成功，可Anat却认为，在促进性别的平等上，她和长期的电影合作者Yifat可以做更多的事情。“于是有一天，我打电话给了Yifat，我说，如果我们希望能让我们的孩子也能明白，他们可以不用因为自己的性别而得到不平等的待遇，所以在早期，我们需要把我们的目光转移到他们所在的时期，以应对不断变化的社会模式。”


Together they founded Toya and quickly hit upongaming - “the epicenter of today's culture” Anat calls it - as the way todeliver this message. “It’s the most creative, flexible, and dynamic industryof today.”

于是她们建立了Toya工作室，她们毫不犹豫地选择了游戏领域。 Anat认为，为了传递这一信息，她选择了“当今文化的中心”——游戏行业。“这是当今最具创造性、最灵活、最有活力的行业。”


And Minecraft? Anat says it’s the perfect medium toencourage decision-making, strategy and a “can-do attitude” in its players -all the while telling the stories of strong female role-models. 

所以她们为什么选择了Minecraft？ Anat说，在游玩Minecraft时，游戏鼓励他们来决策，体会到策略的魅力，让他们得到“我可以做到这些！”的想法 ——同时还可以给他们讲述那些优秀女性的故事。









“There are so many untold stories of extraordinary women that it can be hard to choose,” says Anat. “We invite the whole team tobrainstorm the gameplay that will enable us to come as close as possible to thework and life achievements of a specific role model. After we decide on the person we start to disassemble the story into pieces that will eventually become mini games alongside the story.”
“可是，非凡的女性很多，故事也有很多，我们很难抉择。”Anat说。“我们邀请了所有团队人员，集思广益，目的是选出那些故事尽可能接近工作与成就的人物。当我们最终确定了那位女性之后，我们开始把故事分解成几部分，以便于制作成小游戏与它的背景故事。”


Too often the stories of these women have been overlooked by history. Like, for example, one of Anat’s own role models: the pioneer filmmaker Alice Guy-Blaché. “I found out about her long after I received my BFA in film.Everyone was teaching us about [male filmmakers] D.W Griffith and Lumierebrothers but nobody ever mentioned Blaché.”

这些女性的故事常常被历史忽视。 就像Anat的偶像之一：电影制片人先驱 - Alice Guy-Blaché “当我取得我的艺术学学士学位之后，过了很久我才了解到她，所有教过我的人，都教我们关于 [男性电影制作人] D.W Griffith 和 Lumierebrothers的东西，却从来没有人提到过 Blaché。”


It’s a bit of a poor show considering Guy-Blaché was one of the first filmmakers in the world - and almost certainly the first female filmmaker.

Guy-Blaché作为全世界最早的电影制片人之一，甚至可以肯定地说，她是最早的女性电影制片人，这样对待她，的确很不公平。



https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV13k4y1o7Hh





So who will be the next great lady to grace Toya’s games? It’s a secret! Anat will say this much, however: “We are developing a game that will enable you to paint in Minecraft. We have chosen an abstract painter that was a master of colors and shapes.”

所以下一个为Toya游戏增添光彩的女性会是谁？ 按理说Anat应该不会告诉你答案，但是她却透露道：“我们正在制作一款游戏，你将可以在Minecraft中绘画。我们已经寻找到了那位女性，她是抽象派画家，而且专精于色彩搭配与形状塑造。”


A quick Google search suggests that there is no shortage of brilliant women painters that could be the focus - which hopefully means plenty more Toya maps for us! 
谷歌搜索表明，有很多杰出的女性绘画家符合要求，她们也许有一天会被Toya工作室注意到，那么这是否意味着未来可能有更多的Toya 地图可以供我们游玩！
